q: What type of company are you?

choices.text: We are a head hunter, I want to match you to a client, need client interview
We are a software development house developing software for other company, no client interview needed
We are a company developing packaged software
We are a in house IT Department

q: How important is English to you?

choices.text: Critical, we need to communicate with client or co worker in English speaking country
Essential, we need it extensive for our product search and development
All code, document and communication must be in Chinese

q: What Windows Platform skill you are interested?
What Android Platform skill you are interested?
How many of these skill you interested? (Google Cloud, Azure, Angular 4+, Chrome Extension)
Have the resume reviewed and approved by a technical hiring manager?

choices.text: Yes, the hiring manager is interested in you
